website_summaries.verdict: With its stylish looks, soft fabric and a spacious build, the Teva Original Universal proves to be a wise choice for most individuals looking for a versatile footgear. This lightweight sandal features a minimalist design. While the pair is best suited to light activities such as walking, it may be worn on not-so-challenging trails in hot climates. A few wearers, however, were dissatisfied with the durability and the design of the sandal.
pros: Almost every user was happy about how comfortable the sandal was
A large number of buyers admired the Teva Original Universal for the soft fabric used on its upper
Many wearers lauded its minimalistic design
It was easy to wear, a user said
The sandals’ versatility allowed most people to use it on a multitude of activities—from everyday use to hiking on the trails
Numerous purchasers, including a few fashionistas, fell in love with the looks
An individual mentioned that the sandal went well with every outfit
It has a spacious and breezy design
Several adventure-lovers wore the footgear during explorations, especially in hot desert climates
Some individuals pointed out that the sandal fits perfectly on their wide feet
Experts were more than impressed with the sandal’s lightness
cons: According to a few disgruntled users, the sandals came apart after only a few weeks of use
Some owners found the ankle strap too short
The Velcro pulled away when they started to walk

customer_reviews.title: Slippery When Wet
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing my older Tevas from many years ago. I primarily use this to go on canoe trips and water shoes. I was alittle disappointed that the footbed was so slippery when they got wet. I know these are not the top of the line Teva's but with the amount I get to go Floating I really didn't want to invest a ton of money into getting a new pair of river sandals. They have a very cool look and when dry are very comfortable for the type of sandal they are.
customer_reviews.author: David Henry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. They fit a bit large
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. They fit a bit large. If you normally wear a 9.5, order a 9. Fairly comfortable for someone who is used to wearing shoes. I have a small blister on my small toe. Otherwise comfortable and seemingly well made with good materials.
customer_reviews.author: steveb

customer_reviews.title: Iconic design subtly updated
customer_reviews.text: I really like the updated version, the product has definitely evolved. As a former river guide many of us would duct tape the velcro on the strap behind the heel, they no longer have velcro on that strap and it was more a bug than a feature in my experience. We used to find a great many "barely used" Tevas floating in eddys, (never in my size) usually due to the heel strap coming loose. The leather footbeds are quite nice. I probably should give them 5 stars but there is always room for improvement.

customer_reviews.title: Stains your feet, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. I love Tevas but this model is useless when wet. The dye from the fake leather sole comes off and stains your skin. Bought at the end of last year and haven't work till this spring. Got wet and when I got home my feet were stained black. Washed with soap and still completely black.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: So, the reviews that mention blisters? Yeah, don't ignore those. The strapping has hard rough edges and sharp nylon thread that will dig into your pinky toe fairly quickly. The heel strap is made of a much nicer, more comfortable material, but the rest is just unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: SANDALS
customer_reviews.text: These are sandals so not expecting arch support ....decent product for the price however the edge of the front against my foot is a bit sharp and irritating ...not terrible but noticeable . Hopefully once I wear them awhile I will get used to it . Not the most comfortable sandals but just OK .
customer_reviews.author: HAL HALLIBURTON

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: It's a good-looking original Teva, but the picture shows a leather insole. The sandal I was sent had a suede vinyl sole, not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Koan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, if you're lucky
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $14 bucks. Two days later it was $72 bucks. The size 11 is a little big, I'm a 10 or 11, but there's no way I'm sending it back, the straps fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DaMoopies

customer_reviews.title: Perfect river shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect river shoes. Have survived a whole summer and still holding up great. Not the best traction but have a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after a couple days it’s seating wonderful! Very light weight nice colour
customer_reviews.text: When be New it’s hard fit in somewhere, after a couple days it’s seating wonderful! Very light weight nice colour
customer_reviews.author: Aslan

customer_reviews.title: They might fit somebody better if the have narrower feet
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because the clip in the front of the shoe rubbed my two when I walked. They might fit somebody better if the have narrower feet
customer_reviews.author: guy obermeier

customer_reviews.title: and not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Under circumstances become discolored feet sweat, my feet turned black, and not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Zhen huang

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Why did they put a metal loop on the little toe? No wonder Steve had a blister on his toe! These go back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thurman

customer_reviews.title: super comfy, good grip
customer_reviews.text: metal parts rubbed my feet, but once I healed up it doesn't bother me any more. super comfy, good grip. great for hiking or everday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronish

customer_reviews.title: Effective, and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I got blisters the first week I wore them, but I persevered, and now they are my favorite summer shoe wear. Great for hiking, going to the lake, walking around town, or chilling at home. They never break, and the straps fit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of teva sandals great product
customer_reviews.author: kenny cadarett

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good. Taken them on a few couple mile hikes ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels good. Taken them on a few couple mile hikes through water and they've done great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Neilsons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got the olive/red color and I really like them. I got these because the ball of my foot has been hurting after wearing regular sandals and wanted something that put less stress on it. The sandals are great, they hold in place really well, I haven't had the same issue with rubbing or the metal thing near the toes that the other reviewers had, and haven't felt much pain in my foot. I don't have much to say about durability as I've only had them a few days, but they seem to be well made and can see myself wearing them regularly. Good quality sandals for good price, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rekas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Teva's  . Do not buy if you're expecting quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap garbage . It is not up to the quality of true Teva sandals . I think it's a knock off because Teva would not put their name on something low quality
customer_reviews.author: MVDJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected having to go a half size larger. Very comfy, perfect for almost year round california weather
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Canadians love them
customer_reviews.text: AS expected. And super stylish. Got me a date with a Canadian woman ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 12 and I got the 11s which fit great! They look better in person, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Koni

customer_reviews.title: I have wide feet and the straps are a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and the straps are a little too short. adjusted for my feet only leaves about a half inch of Velcro securing the strap. the fabric is also a little stiff. I also own a pair of the original universal lux in black and do not have an issue with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: AcP

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, but not as good look as on the ...
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable,but not as good look as on the website,so totally I give it four stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disposable sandles
customer_reviews.text: Straps are not long enough for a large foot, foot bed is has very little arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Expected longer life
customer_reviews.text: I thought Teva’s were a long lasting product. Although I did get 3-4 years of use out of mine, the strap broke while walking in a swift river. I probably used these well within their boundaries, but also lit some decent stress on them over the years. I just expected a little more life out of them as the tread and footbed were still in great condition. Not sure if the fact that these particular ones are canvas straps which after years of playing in lakes and streams just broke down. Oh well, probably giving chacos a try next as I’ve tried them on and are far more comfortable than Teva’s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're better than decent.
customer_reviews.text: These are fine. I agree with some other reviewers that the metal piece by your pinky toe is going to dig in and cause some irritation if you do much in these. I would not consider them "workwear" at all, but they're great for casually hanging out in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandals i only been using it for a month and it seem to be holding up , the quality there it feels like it will last a long time . The size ran true so order your natural shoe size . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Manman

product_meta.title: Teva Mens M Original Universal Workwear-M M Original Universal Workwear-m
product_meta.description: Heavy canvas upper Flannel lining Hook and loop closures Universal strapping system Leather footbed Durabrasion Rubber outsole Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
feature_bullets: Sandal featuring plaid backstrap and adjustable hook-and-loop straps at vamp and toe
